Variable


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[HOVER\_MS](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.hover_ms_variable.md)


</td><td>

Delay before tooltip appears.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[LIMIT](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.limit_variable.md)


</td><td>

Maximum width (in characters) of a tooltip.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[MARGINS](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.margins_variable.md)


</td><td>

Horizontal padding between tooltip and screen edge.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OFFSET\_X](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.offset_x_variable.md)


</td><td>

Horizontal offset between mouse cursor and tooltip.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[OFFSET\_Y](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.offset_y_variable.md)


</td><td>

Vertical offset between mouse cursor and tooltip.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[RADIUS\_OK](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.radius_ok_variable.md)


</td><td>

Radius mouse can move before killing tooltip.


</td></tr>

## Type Aliases

<table><thead><tr><th>

Type Alias


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

[CustomTooltip](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.customtooltip_typealias.md)


</td><td>

A function that renders custom tooltip UI. 1st parameter: the div element to render content into. 2nd parameter: the element being moused over (i.e., the element for which the tooltip should be shown).


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md)


</td><td>

A type which can define a tooltip. Either a string, an object containing a tooltip property, or a function which returns either a string, or another arbitrarily nested function which eventually unwinds to a string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
